TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a claim for a security token that asserts an authorization decision regarding access to a specific resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions. The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>. A <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement> asserts an authorization decision by a SAML authority regarding access to a specific resource. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource> class represents a claim resource for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionStatement>.

MemberSignature.Value: public SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource (string resource, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision decision, string actionName, string actionNamespace);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string resource, valuetype System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAccessDecision decision, string actionName, string actionNamespace) cil managed

Docs.param: The resource the subject is seeking access to.
The action sought by the subject on the resource specified in the resource parameter.
The XML namespace in which the action specified in the action parameter is defined.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified resource the subject is seeking access to, the authorization decision regarding the resource, the action sought on the resource, and the XML namespace in which the action is defined.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following table details the properties set by the parameters passed to this constructor.
|Parameter|Property| |---------------|--------------| |`resource`|<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.Resource%2A>| |`accessDecision`|<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.AccessDecision%2A>| |`actionNamespace`|<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.ActionNamespace%2A>| |`actionName`|<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.ActionName%2A>|

Docs.summary: Gets the authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority regarding the access to the resource by the subject.
Docs.value: The authorization decision rendered by the SAML authority regarding the access to the resource by the subject.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Decision` attribute of the `<AuthorizationDecisionStatement>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

Docs.summary: Gets the action sought by the subject on the resource specified in the property.
Docs.value: The action sought by the subject on the resource specified in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.ActionName%2A> property corresponds to the `<Action>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.

Docs.summary: Gets the XML namespace in which the action specified in the property is defined.
Docs.value: The XML namespace in which the action specified in the property is defined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAuthorizationDecisionClaimResource.AccessDecision%2A> property corresponds to the `Namespace` attribute of the `<Action>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
